title: Cashing back unused runes
body:
Wondering if there is or ever will be an idea in the works for cashing in your Tier 1/2 runes that you no longer use? Even if its for say 1/4 of the original IP cost. I think it would tidy up the selectable runes list, as well as create a way to generate a fraction more IP back from runes you will possibly never use again.

Sloth

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Sloth Almighty,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EqAcpBjp,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-05-24T23:37:33.651+0000)
>
> Wondering if there is or ever will be an idea in the works for cashing in your Tier 1/2 runes that you no longer use? 

There are no T1 or T2 unes you can no longer use. You can still use them if you wish.
It's not that T1/T2 runes *can't* be used, it's that they become redundant once a player has access to T3 runes and do nothing more than take up rune "inventory" slots.
